content:
Looking for some public reference implementations for V2-FHIR. Want to test out some HL7 V2.x messages and corresponding FHIR bundles.
Any pointers.
@Kumar Satyam I have been using the Microsoft open source one. https://github.com/microsoft/FHIR-Converter
The Google mappings are also available on github: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/healthcare-data-harmonization/
